msg.msgText: Failed to retrieve destinationLookup object {0} because the class {1} is not an IBM WIoTP Message Gateway destination class. This can happen if the name property on the destination administered object {0} was not set.

msgExplanation.p: The Message Gateway resource adapter supports only IBM WIoTP Message Gateway destination objects. The name property must be set for destination objects retrieved from JNDI.

msgUserResponse.p: Check the configuration of the JNDI object and ensure that the name property is set.
